data.name: Monster Hunter World: Iceborne
data.detailed_description:
Featured DLC
































About the Game

Monster Hunter World: Iceborne ‚Äì a massive new expansion

‚ÄúExplore the New World‚Ä¶ and Beyond!‚Äú
Monster Hunter: World‚Äôs adventures reach new heights in ‚ÄúMonster Hunter World: Iceborne.‚Äù
With new monsters, new locales, new quests, new weapon combos, and so much more,
Iceborne expands the possibilities of Monster Hunter: World‚Äôs vast, breathtaking universe.

Join the Research Commission as they embark on an unforgettable adventure into the
depths of the Hoarfrost Reach, a snowy tundra that a host of legendary monsters call home.

Iceborne nearly DOUBLES the content from Monster Hunter: World
„ÉªNew Monsters: The number of Large Monsters soars from 36 to over 66, with more coming in free updates!
„ÉªNew Story: The number of Story Assignments jumps from 25 to over 50!
„ÉªNew Locales: Explore the glacial landscapes of the Hoarfrost Reach!
„ÉªNew Weapon Combos: Breathe new life into your combat with a series of brand-new attacks and combos
„ÉªNew Armor: Suit up and customize your hunter with a wide variety of powerful armor skills!
„ÉªNew Tools: Stack the odds in your favor with the revolutionary new Clutch Claw!
„ÉªNew Headquarters: Group up and prepare for battle in the all-new social hub Seliana!
„ÉªNew Difficulty: Test your mettle with the new quest difficulty Master Rank!
„ÉªNew End Game: The journey never ends in the Guiding Lands!
‚Ä¶and much more!

The frozen frontier awaits‚Ä¶

SteamüÑ¨ Version Features
-Uncapped Framerate
-High Resolution Texture Pack
-Graphical Optimization
-Ultrawide Display Support
-DirectX¬Æ 12 Support
-Improved Mouse & Keyboard Controls

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows¬Æ 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel¬Æ Core‚Ñ¢ i5 4460 or Core‚Ñ¢ i3 9100F / AMD FX‚Ñ¢-6300 or Ryzen‚Ñ¢ 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA¬ÆGeForce¬ÆGTX 760 or GTX1050 or AMD Radeon‚Ñ¢ R7 260x or RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 48 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX¬Æ 9.0c or later)
  • Additional Notes: - These specs allow for the game to be played in 1080p/30fps with graphics settings at "Low". - 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows¬Æ 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel¬Æ Core‚Ñ¢ i7 3770 or Core‚Ñ¢ i3 8350 or Core‚Ñ¢ i3 9350F / AMD Ryzen‚Ñ¢ 5 1500X or Ryzen‚Ñ¢ 5 3400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA¬Æ GeForce¬Æ GTX 1060 (VRAM 3GB) or GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon‚Ñ¢ RX 480 or RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 48 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX¬Æ 9.0c or later)
  • Additional Notes: - These specs allow for the game to be played in 1080p/30fps with graphics settings at "High". - 64-bit processor and operating system are required. - Windows 10 (Version 1809 or later) and a 4GB VRAM GPU (graphics board or video card) are required for DirectX 12 API.
